title: How can I check the remaining battery capacity?
answer:
Swipe down on the home screen to access the **Quick Setting** menu. The remaining battery capacity will be displayed as a percentage.

Touch ![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/733c1_fblca.png) in the Android Wear app to access the settings, then select your Huawei Watch under **DEVICE SETTINGS**. Touch **Watch battery** to view the remaining battery percentage and detailed battery usage statistics.
